backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two features: generating a new logo and updating header/footer references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High-level descriptions of all frontend components, content files, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with SEO meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing header, sections, and footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/Sections/AboutSe: About section showing company description, highlights, and a visual stats card.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Contact: Contact form with validation, contact info, business hours, and submission state handling.
frontend/src/components/Sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, intro text, and buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Service: Grid of service cards using mapped icons and content from siteCopy.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with new logo, navigation links, services list, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header component with logo, desktop nav buttons, and a mobile sheet menu that scrolls to page sections.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Static marketing copy defining hero text, about description, and detailed service descriptions for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty query set since no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables and construction-themed light/dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom fonts, colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, requirements, features, notes, and image needs for the PATIL Construction site.
